description: This course explain basic valuation principles and give information about unique author system of asset valuation. First of all we start from perspectives of Russian economy. It's not so bad as it seems. Then we move to the infrastructure of the market: exchanges, custody and brokerage companies. Each aspect will be reviewed briefly. Than Trading platforms: Quik and NetInvestor. After that, we analyze current approaches to valuation that are considered official in Russia. So, after we understand basics we move to professional level and study my own system of asset management (valuation). Finally, small bonus from me: valuation of options (tricks).
title: How to invest in Russian equity market
